Biography

Career Highlights

America East Honor Roll (2017)

FRESHMAN (2017)

Started 13 games as a freshman, seeing time in the outfield and at DH … hit .167 with nine hits and three RBI … had three multi-hit games … 2-for-3 with one RBI vs. UAlbany (5/13) … 2-for-4 with a run scored vs. CCSU (5/17).

BEFORE HARTFORD

Played four years of baseball at Norco High School for coach Gary Parcell … batted .348 as a senior, with a league-best four home runs … First Team All-League as a senior … two-time Big VIII Champion … two-time Darryl Kile Tournament Champion … played in the Inland Empire vs. San Bernardino County All-Star Game … selected as a Sunset Baseball Collegiate League All-Star as a member of the Arroyo Seco Saints … graduated high school with honors.

CAREER HIGHS

Hits: 2 (3x), Last: vs.CCSU (5.17.17)
